User
Serializable
User

Holds user specific data > id, name, role (trainer or trainee), which can be retrieved through functions getId(), getName() and getRole() respectively.

Properties
id

Value of the user id.

name

Holds the user name.

role

Holds the user role.

Functions
__toString
public function __toString()

Returns the current User parameters as json encoded string.

getId
public function getId()

Returns the user id.

getRole
public function getRole()

Returns the user role.

getName
public function getName()

Returns the user name.
